= Feature Overview =

The following table gives an overview of the features of Wicked Charts and which features are supported for which GUI framework. Each feature is described on a separate wiki page.

|| *Feature* || *wicked-charts-wicket6* || *wicked-charts-wicket15* || *wicked-charts-jsf21 ||
|| [BasicChartTypes Basic Chart Types] || yes || yes || yes ||
|| [AdvancedChartTypes Advanced Chart Types] || yes || yes || yes ||
|| [LiveUpdatingCharts Live Updating Charts] || yes || no || no ||
|| [Drilldown Drilldown] || yes || yes || no ||
|| [AjaxUpdatableCharts Ajax Updatable Charts] || yes || yes || no ||
|| [LinksOnPoints Links on Points]] || yes || yes || yes ||
|| [GlobalConfiguration Global Configuration] || yes || yes || no||
|| [DifferentJQueryAndHighchartsVersion	 Override JQuery Version] || yes || yes || no ||
